articles.title: Beyoncé Celebrates Blue Ivy After She Takes Stage at Renaissance World Tour: 'My Sweet Angel' - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Blue Ivy joins her mother onstage during night one in Paris, France.
articles.content:
Beyoncé is a proud mama!
